title: Zed and Yasuo tips
body: Hey, can someone give me some tips for Zed and Yasuo so I can improve my game with them plz.{{champion:157}} {{champion:238}}

replies.body:
Zed: press R on someone who can't run away
Yasuo: land a tornado in a team fight and ult on it

r/ zed mains r yas mains


there are yas mains here, but the best info comes from the dedicated champ reddits
